overview:
Ellen Feaheny leads AppFusions (www.appfusions.com), providing key strategic corporate development efforts to drive sales, marketing, customer development, and product management.

Like all entrepreneurs, Ellen does not work - or succeed -alone in her journey!

She’s brought together a superstar team of engineering experts and key technology partners that collectively have enabled AppFusions to become the unique entity it is already, with a promising future ahead.

The amazing accomplishments of her team and solid partner relationships are her greatest career prides.

AppFusions is a systems integrator and solutions provider that offers multi-technology application development services to help enterprises harness together workflows and key data systems for improved efficiencies.

More tangibly, AppFusions has created many unique solutions, including integration applications with Atlassian JIRA, Confluence, and Crowd, IBM Connections, IBM Sametime, Jive Software, iRise, Alfresco, Dropbox, Box, UserVoice, Google Docs, Google Analytics, and more coming!

With a hyper-penchant for rapid agile development and delivery, done well, AppFusions’ Atlassian SW technologies’ expertise is some of the most technically capable in the industry. AppFusions portfolio of products and active engagement in the community only further exemplifies this high level of expertise.

Ellen can be reached at ellen at appfusions dot com.
